nodes.text: A Dantooinian sphere-fruit was a round type of fruit native to the planet of Dantooine that was available in the galaxy during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire.

Dantooinian sphere-fruits were first mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare and LucasArts in 2011. If a male Jedi Knight pursues a romance with the companion character Kira Carsen, she will compare how her figure looks in a Jedi robe to a sphere-fruit in one of the messages she sends the player.
